docs.snippet: Spanish elections delivered a hung parliament for the second time in six months on Sunday, adding to political uncertainty in Europe after last week's shock Brexit vote and piling intense pressure on Spain's warring politicians to form a governmen...
docs.lead_paragraph: Spanish elections delivered a hung parliament for the second time in six months on Sunday, adding to political uncertainty in Europe after last week's shock Brexit vote and piling intense pressure on Spain's warring politicians to form a government.

headline.main: Spanish Vote Delivers More Uncertainty for Europe After Brexit
headline.print_headline: Spanish Vote Delivers More Uncertainty for Europe After Brexit

docs.snippet: Britain faced unending political chaos Sunday as Scotland's leader declared the Scottish parliament might try to block Britain's exit from the European Union and lawmakers in the opposition Labour Party revolted against their chief for his lacklus...
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain faced unending political chaos Sunday as Scotland's leader declared the Scottish parliament might try to block Britain's exit from the European Union and lawmakers in the opposition Labour Party revolted against their chief for his lackluster efforts to convince British voters to stay in the bloc.

headline.main: British Politics in Disarray; Scotland Hopes to Block Brexit
headline.print_headline: British Politics in Disarray; Scotland Hopes to Block Brexit

docs.snippet: "Game of Thrones," the hit HBO cable TV series that is partly filmed in Northern Ireland, will not suffer due to Britain's decision to leave the European Union, the cable network said on Friday, aiming to quash speculation that the lavishly produc...
docs.lead_paragraph: "Game of Thrones," the hit HBO cable TV series that is partly filmed in Northern Ireland, will not suffer due to Britain's decision to leave the European Union, the cable network said on Friday, aiming to quash speculation that the lavishly produced show would lose EU funding.

headline.main: HBO Says Brexit Won't Hurt 'Game of Thrones' Production
headline.print_headline: HBO Says Brexit Won't Hurt 'Game of Thrones' Production

docs.snippet: Crispin Odey, a hedge fund manager who backed the campaign for Britain to leave the European Union, could turn out to be one of the biggest financial winners of the vote to quit the bloc....
docs.lead_paragraph: Crispin Odey, a hedge fund manager who backed the campaign for Britain to leave the European Union, could turn out to be one of the biggest financial winners of the vote to quit the bloc.

headline.main: Brexit Lands Hedge Fund Chief Odey a Double Winner
headline.print_headline: Brexit Lands Hedge Fund Chief Odey a Double Winner

docs.snippet: Within hours of Britons voting to leave the European Union, politicians in Scotland, Ireland and Spain raced on Friday to argue that the historic move bolstered claims over long-disputed parts of British territory....
docs.lead_paragraph: Within hours of Britons voting to leave the European Union, politicians in Scotland, Ireland and Spain raced on Friday to argue that the historic move bolstered claims over long-disputed parts of British territory.

headline.main: From Edinburgh to Gibraltar, Brexit Vote Sparks New Claims
headline.print_headline: From Edinburgh to Gibraltar, Brexit Vote Sparks New Claims

docs.snippet: The European Central Bank is ready to manage impact on financial markets and the banking system of the British vote to leave the European Union, a senior ECB official said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The European Central Bank is ready to manage impact on financial markets and the banking system of the British vote to leave the European Union, a senior ECB official said on Friday.

headline.main: ECB Ready to Manage Financial Impact of Brexit Vote-Official
headline.print_headline: ECB Ready to Manage Financial Impact of Brexit Vote-Official

docs.snippet: The campaign for Britain to leave the European Union has a two-point lead over the rival "In" camp, down from a seven-point lead last week, according to a TNS poll published on Wednesday, the day before the country's EU membership referendum....
docs.lead_paragraph: The campaign for Britain to leave the European Union has a two-point lead over the rival "In" camp, down from a seven-point lead last week, according to a TNS poll published on Wednesday, the day before the country's EU membership referendum.

headline.main: UK Brexit Campaign's Lead Narrows Ahead of Referendum: TNS Poll
headline.print_headline: UK Brexit Campaign's Lead Narrows Ahead of Referendum: TNS Poll

docs.snippet: Confidence at Japanese manufacturers inched up in June from the prior month's three-year low and is seen rising only slightly ahead, a Reuters poll found, reflecting worries about the yen's rise as Britain decides whether or not to quit the Europe...
docs.lead_paragraph: Confidence at Japanese manufacturers inched up in June from the prior month's three-year low and is seen rising only slightly ahead, a Reuters poll found, reflecting worries about the yen's rise as Britain decides whether or not to quit the European Union.

headline.main: Japan Business Mood Struggles Amid Brexit Fears-Reuters Tankan
headline.print_headline: Japan Business Mood Struggles Amid Brexit Fears-Reuters Tankan

docs.snippet: Dawn, next Friday. The votes are in. The British have spoken in their EU membership referendum and they want out. It is a scenario European leaders are planning for in earnest while praying it never happens....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dawn, next Friday. The votes are in. The British have spoken in their EU membership referendum and they want out. It is a scenario European leaders are planning for in earnest while praying it never happens.

headline.main: After Brexit: Roadmap for a Leap in the Dark
headline.print_headline: After Brexit: Roadmap for a Leap in the Dark

docs.snippet: Britain would become a minor trading post no more important on the world stage than the island of Guernsey if it voted to leave the European Union next week, France's economy minister was quoted as saying on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain would become a minor trading post no more important on the world stage than the island of Guernsey if it voted to leave the European Union next week, France's economy minister was quoted as saying on Saturday.

headline.main: Brexit Would Turn UK Into Minor Trading Post: French Minister
headline.print_headline: Brexit Would Turn UK Into Minor Trading Post: French Minister
